actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.

summary.text: Extends for a 10 year period (until October 2, 1978) the time for which the Federal Power Commission may not receive or approve the construction of any water insurance projects on rivers designated under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act. Increases the appropriations for acquisition of lands and interest under the Act to $37,600,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.
